title: Pressley, Warren visit major Mass. cities to help people apply for student loan forgiveness
dc:creator: WBUR
description: The well-known Democrats are scheduled to visit Boston, Brockton, Worcester and Springfield to assist eligible residents with relief applications.

media:content.media:description: U.S. Rep. Ayanna Pressley, D-Mass., right, responds to questions from reporters as U.S. Sen. Elizabeth Warren, D-Mass., left, looks on during a news conference in April 2021. (Steven Senne/AP)
